Articles.Content: Although I have been playing Kerbal Space Program for a few weeks now, this is the first time I have participated in the Forum. I just thought I'd introduce myself with the un-imaginative name of Edd.

Hey edd! Welcome to the forums!

You can find tutorials on youtube, or use the "how to..." section of the forums. They can help you get into an orbit, to the mun and back, and some will start helping with getting to other planets. Quite a bit of math involved in some orbital rendezvous maneuvers, but it's not too difficult.
